task:
Using the kidney Xenium dataset with per-cell spatial centroids (x, y), assign each cell to one of the 2 populations in the vocabulary below using exact strings. Then report the SET of unique cell types present in your predictions (order does not matter).

Vocabulary:Fib, Per-SMC

scoring.set_definition: Compare the SET of unique predicted labels (after any mapping) against ground_truth_labels; duplicates and order are ignored; strings must match exactly.
scoring.description: Requires an exact match to all 2 categories (Jaccard = 1.0).
